医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
使用抗生素和高脂肪饮食后肠道微生物的缺失可能是无糖糖果和口香糖产生胀气的原因最近的一项细胞研究表明，高脂肪饮食和抗生素暴露如何通过消耗肠道微生物群中的梭菌而引发山梨醇不耐受。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240220/Missing-gut-microbes-after-antibiotics-and-a-high-fat-diet-may-be-to-blame-for-sugar-free-糖果和口香糖给你加油.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240220/Missing-gut-microbes-after-antibiotics-and-a-high-fat-diet-may-be-to-blame-for-sugar-free-糖果和口香糖给你加油.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d18ac9b6-cd12-487f-bdeb-6645196c7636 Tue, 20 Feb 2024 03:17:00 -0500 Missing gut microbes after antibiotics and a high-fat diet may be to blame for sugar-free candy and gum giving you gas
库欣病缓解后患自身免疫性疾病的风险增加一项对超过 250 名接受库欣病 (CD) 或无功能性垂体腺瘤 (NFPA) 手术治疗的患者进行的研究发现，获得 CD 缓解的患者比接受手术治疗 NFPA 的患者在 3 年内更容易出现新发自身免疫性疾病缓解后。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240219/Increased-risk-of-autoimmune-disease-after-Cushings-disease-remission.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240219/Increased-risk-of-autoimmune-disease-after-Cushings-disease-remission.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c9a38e12-7f38-4e66-9534-7468e3e97d48 Mon, 19 Feb 2024 23:36:39 -0500 Increased risk of autoimmune disease after Cushing's disease remission
由于担心被驱逐出境，美国拉丁裔的困境日益加剧2011 年至 2018 年间，社会和政治格局发生了变化，伴随着 DACA 规则变更、新总统领导层、移民法案等重大事件，一个重大威胁迫在眉睫——；驱逐出境。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240219/The-rising-distress-among-Latinos-in-the-US-amid-deportation-fears.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240219/The-rising-distress-among-Latinos-in-the-US-amid-deportation-fears.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e696dcc5-8100-403a-9daf-3008aac1f480 Mon, 19 Feb 2024 23:18:37 -0500 The rising distress among Latinos in the U.S. amidst deportation fears
睡眠昼夜节律紊乱可能引发或加重一系列精神疾病根据对最近研究证据的最新综述，我们的睡眠和生物钟问题可能引发或恶化一系列精神疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240219/Sleep-circadian-disturbances-can-trigger-or-worsen-a-range-of-psychiatric-disorders.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240219/Sleep-circadian-disturbances-can-trigger-or-worsen-a-range-of-psychiatric-disorders.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b2add741-abbb-44eb-aea5-cf8107b20404 Mon, 19 Feb 2024 23:01:04 -0500 Sleep-circadian disturbances can trigger or worsen a range of psychiatric disorders
多巴胺如何影响帕金森病患者的运动多巴胺是大脑中的一种化学信使，因其在我们体验快乐和奖励方面的作用而闻名。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240219/How-dopamine-influences-movement-in-Parkinsons.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240219/How-dopamine-influences-movement-in-Parkinsons.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6d125469-3bec-4e16-919f-3c195059161c Mon, 19 Feb 2024 22:54:07 -0500 How dopamine influences movement in Parkinson's
高强度运动影响老年人的运动技能学习高强度间歇训练 (HIIT) 可以增强老年人早期离线运动技能的巩固，但可能会损害即时运动技能的获得，从而挑战了之前关于运动对运动学习普遍有益的假设。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240219/High-intensity-exercise-affects-motor-skill-learning-in-older-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240219/High-intensity-exercise-affects-motor-skill-learning-in-older-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5b043d2c-700b-4679-9f51-b679ccf91a64 Mon, 19 Feb 2024 22:37:00 -0500 High-intensity exercise affects motor skill learning in older adults
通过家长回忆提高学龄前儿童的语言经验和技能语言技能是儿童入学时学业、社会情感和行为结果的有力预测因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240219/Boosting-preschoolers-language-experience-and-skills-through-parent-reminiscing.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240219/Boosting-preschoolers-language-experience-and-skills-through-parent-reminiscing.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e8b5f462-34d1-4d98-8e39-a4c37ff3e134 Mon, 19 Feb 2024 22:11:00 -0500 Boosting preschooler's language experience and skills through parent reminiscing
利用人工智能揭示大脑性别差异斯坦福大学医学院研究人员的一项新研究揭示了一种新的人工智能模型，该模型在确定大脑活动扫描来自女性还是男性方面成功率超过 90%。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240219/Unveiling-brain-sex-differences-with-AI.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240219/Unveiling-brain-sex-differences-with-AI.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b29bc65d-995b-4bf8-944d-46d3e1689053 Mon, 19 Feb 2024 22:07:56 -0500 Unveiling brain sex differences with AI
打呼噜与高血压有关系吗？家庭监测揭示了打鼾持续时间与不受控制的高血压之间的密切联系，强调了在高血压管理中考虑打鼾的必要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240219/Is-snoring-lated-to-high-blood-Pressure.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240219/Is-snoring-lated-to-high-blood-Pressure.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ca6a0bab-937d-48f8-b257-4b455ce4c061 Mon, 19 Feb 2024 22:07:00 -0500 Is snoring related to high blood pressure?
女性从锻炼中获得的健康益处比男性更大根据美国国立卫生研究院支持的一项研究，经常锻炼的女性比经常锻炼的男性早死或致命心血管事件的风险显着降低，即使女性付出的努力较少。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240219/Women-reap-greater-health-benefits-from-exercise-than-men.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240219/Women-reap-greater-health-benefits-from-exercise-than-men.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a598621c-cd96-42ad-a15c-931f824f7a50 Mon, 19 Feb 2024 22:02:42 -0500 Women reap greater health benefits from exercise than men
